title: Nerf Graves for f... sake!!!!
body:
1. If there is somewhere a window from reports directly to the NERF so please send it to me.THX
2.Graves grenade is far too strong when crit attacks gives it overly big DMG !!!!!

replies.body: This Boards page is at EUNE. So please look. It's not EUW and especially not Italian. -.- *
So write it on your board and_ especially_ not scassase a minchia :)

graves is too strong at them moment he can lose all aspects of the game and still come out doing the most damage possible.
so i believe this champ needs a hot fix cause it makes the game so un fun when your playing against him due to his over powered damage plus he is always quite tanky due to passive..............

I am sorry but there's not such report.

If you're good at maths and knows a lot about the game, you can send a ticket to riot explaining everything in detail, of just open a post in the help category of the forum.

source : RULE 19 of internet
___
ps : this is the ITA forum on EUW {{champion:17}}
